answers.author: Randy Webster
answers.text:
We have written business plans, which include a marketing component, for most of our existing community centers. While not wholly a marketing plan for a new center, reviewing some of these may be useful. Find them at http://www.portlandonline.com/parks/index.cfm?c=38306, or Portland Park & Recreation/Who we are/Plans & Reports.

author: Gregory Stopka
text:
A park district in IL is building a recreation center and is interested in developing a marketing plan.  The plan has to include selecting a name for the center. It will have a fitness center, multi-court gymnasium, indoor pool, indoor track and some program rooms. 
Do you know of any agencies that may have sample plans to review?
title: Recreation Center Marketing Plan
